b.u: Corona Virus Update Letter – 3/16/20 – School Canceled From 3/17/20 thru 4/3/20

p.span: Student Food Delivery: In conjunction with local church groups, we will begin delivering food to our students on Tuesday, March 24th. This will be followed by a delivery on Monday, March 30th. We will utilize school buses for delivery and have identified four locations that parents / students can receive food. A Lincoln county R-IV school bus will deliver food at the following locations: Dollar General in Foley, Red Hawk Estates in Old Monroe, Asbury United Methodist Church in Foley (lower lot), and the Winfield High School Parking lot.

p.strong: Next FOOD PICK-UP DAY WILL BE TUESDAY, April 14th from 10-11am to honor Easter Monday, and then back to regular Monday food pick-up.​
